message.content:
cs.CG, cs.DS, cs.LG, cs.NA, cs.CC 

Reasoning: 
- cs.CG (Computational Geometry) is the most likely category as the paper deals with geometric algorithms and the separating hyperplane theorem is a fundamental concept in computational geometry. 
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) is also likely as the paper presents a new algorithm for solving geometric problems. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning) is another possible category as the paper mentions applications in machine learning. 
- cs.NA (Numerical Analysis) is a possible category as the paper discusses the complexity of the algorithm and its approximation properties. 
- cs.CC (Computational Complexity) is also a possible category as the paper mentions extending the applications to NP-complete problems.
